flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to walk 63000 steps in a week because 7 x 9000 = <<7*9000=63000>>63000
He has 81100 steps to walk on Friday and Saturday because 63000 - 9400 - 9100 - 8300 - 9200 - 8900 = <<63000-9400-9100-8300-9200-8900=81100>>81100
He needs to walk an average of 40550 on Friday and Saturday because 81100 / 2 = <<81100/2=40550>>40550
#### 40550

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18100, not 81100. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
